original_text: After many days you will be mustered. In the latter years you will go against the land that is restored from war, the land whose people were gathered from many peoples upon the mountains of Israel, which had been a continual waste. Its people were brought out from the peoples and now dwell securely, all of them.
korean_text: 여러 날 후 곧 말년에 네가 명령을 받고 그 땅 곧 오래 황폐하였던 이스라엘 산에 이르리니 그 땅 백성은 칼을 벗어나서 여러 나라에서 모여 들어오며 이방에서 나와 다 평안히 거주하는 중이라

sentences.original_text: After many days you will be mustered.
sentences.korean_translation: 여러 날이 지난 후에 너는 소집될 것이다.

sentences.original_text: In the latter years you will go against the land
sentences.korean_translation: 후년에 너는 그 땅을 치러 갈 것이니

sentences.original_text: the land whose people were gathered from many peoples
sentences.korean_translation: 그 백성이 여러 민족에게서 모여진 땅이라

sentences.original_text: which had been a continual waste.
Its people were brought out from the peoples
sentences.korean_translation: 그 백성은 여러 민족에게서 이끌려 나왔으며
